name: Anne & the Carrot Islands
description:
Year 2100. Carrots are no longer available on earth. But the legend says that there are secret islands above clouds where carrots can be found in large numbers. Anne, a brave rabbit decide to go there. 

Now, she has to harvest every carrots on these islands to feed all living things on earth.

Controls:

- ARROWS / WASD / ZQSD : Move

Original soundtrack :

Soundtrack is available for free here: https://grizzlygames.bandcamp.com/album/anne-the-carrot-islands 


Credits:

- Boris Warembourg : GD, LD, dev, music, sounds, pixel art.
- Palette "Japanese woodblock" by Polyducks (https://lospec.com/polyducks)
Made for Ludum Dare #52.
